item.text: Please enter the existing alternate numbers regardless of whether or not you want to keep them (You can cancel alternate number(s) after the completed migration by contacting customer support)

item.text: $5 OTC shipping and handling fee for stand alone Digital Home Phone adapter

group.name: creditDetails
group.title: Credit Details - provide one of the following

item.name: sin
item.label: Social Insurance Number
item.detailLabel: This information is optional, but will help to expedite the process of your application.

item.name: birthDate
item.label: Date of birth
item.detailLabel: Mandatory, Customer must be of legal age within province.

onmissing.message: Please, enter your date of birth.

item.name: empContNum
item.label: Employment/Daytime Contact Number
item.detailLabel: This information is optional, but will help to expedite the process of your application.

item.label: Estimated Monthly Usage (total of all services)

item.name: lessThanTwoYears
item.detailLabel: Click here if you have been living at your current address for less than 2 years

item.name: billMethod
item.tag: Please send me my invoice via the regular mail ($.99/mo. fee).
item.label: Billing Method

item.name: chSign
item.label: Cardholder's Signature
item.detailLabel: By signing this form, I authorize Primus to debit the above credit card for all my Primus charges. This authorization may be cancelled at any time upon written notice to Primus. Any delivery of this authorization to you constitutes delivery by me.
item.legalText: By signing this form, I authorize Primus to debit the above credit card for all my Primus charges. This authorization may be cancelled at any time upon written notice to Primus. Any delivery of this authorization to you constitutes delivery by me.

item.name: termsLine
item.text: Primus may make credit inquiries regarding my application and account. This information is confidential and will be used for the sole purpose of establishing and administering my account. I acknowledge that Primus may contact me by phone from time to time to inform me of products, service and bonus offers that may be of interest to me. I understand the details of the savings plan I have selected and that some rates for overseas calls to mobile phones may be higher. I understand that further service availability restrictions may apply at time of service provisioning due to distance of resident from central office.

item.name: custInitial-1
item.label: Customer's Initial
item.detailLabel: I have read all the above information.
item.legalText: I have read all the above information.

item.name: custSign
item.label: Customer's Signature
item.detailLabel: I understand that further service availability restrictions may apply at time of service provisioning due to distance of resident from central office.
item.legalText: I understand that further service availability restrictions may apply at time of service provisioning due to distance of resident from central office.

item.name: finePrint
item.text: To confirm that your long distance carrier has been switched to Primus, call toll free 1 700 555-4141 within 15 business days. For Technical Support, call toll free 1 800 370-0015. For customer support, call toll free 1 888 829-6413.

relationship.condition: (homePhone == "false" AND longDist == "true") OR tradHomePh == "1" OR digHomePhNT == "1" OR digHomePhT == "1" OR tradHomePh == "2" OR digHomePhNT == "2" OR digHomePhT == "2"
tradHomePh == "3" OR digHomePhNT == "3" OR digHomePhT == "3" OR tradHomePh == "4"
digHomePhNT == "1" OR digHomePhNT == "2" OR digHomePhT == "1" OR digHomePhT == "2"
highSpeedNT == "7" OR highSpeedNT == "16" OR highSpeed2YT == "7" OR highSpeed2YT == "16"
highSpeedNT == "25" OR highSpeedNT == "50" OR highSpeed2YT == "25" OR highSpeed2YT == "50"
